biotools.summary: This server can be used for predicting real valued relative solvent possibilities of amino acid residues in proteins, and for improved prediction of secondary structures using evolutionary profiles and predicted relative solvent accessibility of an amino acid residue as a fingerprint of the overall packing.

bioschemas.name: SABLE
bioschemas.summary: This server can be used for predicting real valued relative solvent possibilities of amino acid residues in proteins, and for improved prediction of secondary structures using evolutionary profiles and predicted relative solvent accessibility of an amino acid residue as a fingerprint of the overall packing.
